availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Simon Vanarsdale (Oldham County, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Father of Sallie Vanarsdale and William E. Vanarsdale. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in 1860. Justice of the peace in Oldham County in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 53; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 9; Find A Grave, "Simon Vanarsdale (1812-1885)," Memorial #53739066, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=53739066&ref=acom (accessed March 9, 2017).
